page.title: 06DAIRY FARMING
page.content: Mr.Toogood's dairy farm is between Holly Well Lake and Langford Budville.All his family have lived on the same farm for 100 years. Mr. Toogood owns 107 acres and he mainly uses his fields for grazing. He only has 85 cows and 30 calves on the farm. He gets about 1050 litres of milk. He can fit eight cows in his milking parlour but can only milk four at a time with the Alfa Laval machine. He puts his cows to the bull in the spring. He sends his bullocks to market and he rears only the heffers. He has eight outbuildings and one milking parlour.
